dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Associated Content
dmca.body:
Google, Inc. 
Attn: Blogger Legal Support 
DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, California 94043
 
1. Material that has been infringed upon: 
http://www.associatedcontent.com/article/108726/healthy_diet_tips_for_eating_out_guidelines.html 
Published December 29th 2006 
http://www.associatedcontent.com/article/111967/seven_ways_to_deal_with_menstrual_symptoms.html 
Published January 9th, 2007 
http://www.associatedcontent.com/article/111322/common_causes_and_signs_of_premature.html
Published January 11th, 2007 
http://www.associatedcontent.com/article/118168/my_annual_mammogram.html - 
Published January 15th, 2007 
http://www.associatedcontent.com/article/705/self_breast_exams_an_investment_in.html
Published March 21,2005 
http://www.associatedcontent.com/article/114773/breast_milk_and_its_many_uses.html
Published January 7, 2007 

All of the above material was taken, word for word, from several different Content 
Producers at AssociatedContent.com. It should be noted that, while conducting this search for stolen material, I discovered that the blogger in question also copied, word for word, from sites such as MSNBC.com, CBS News, and Reuters.
 
2. Infringing material (each corresponds to the above URLs, in order) 
http://diet-inform.blogspot.com/2006/12/healthy-diet-tips-for-eating-out.html 
Published December 30th 2006 
http://blog-about-womens-health.blogspot.com/2007/01/seven-ways-to-deal-with-menstrual.html
Published January 9th, 2007 
http://blog-about-womens-health.blogspot.com/2007/01/common-causes-and-signs-of-premature.html
Published January 11th, 2007
http://blog-about-womens-health.blogspot.com/2007/01/my-annual-mammogram.html
Published January 16th 2007 
http://blog-about-womens-health.blogspot.com/2007/01/self-breast-exams-investment-in-your.html 
Published January 21, 2007 
http://blog-about-womens-health.blogspot.com/2007/01/breast-milk-and-its-many-uses.html
Published January 7, 2007 

3. Contact information: 
Sam DeWitt - Content Manager 
Associatedcontent.com 
Sam@AssociatedContent.com 
88 Steele Street
Suite 250
Denver, Colorado 80224 
Direct: 720-837-6935 

Craig Abruzzo
